column4: I'm saying I get bored with complete out of the box functionality
yes its nice
but I like to dive into the OS every once and a while :D
Not that many problems...
Like I said I dive into my OS
and then I do something stupid and have to reinstall :D
unrar
sudo apt-get install rar unrar-nonfree
AptGet owns :D
I do enjoy making my own Backports from Breezy though
if they build straight from breezy, and you think it's worth putting into the offical repo, feel free to mailthe mailing list and suggest them
its called the Backports :D
I know... I'm a backports developer
hence i'm saying if you're backporting thing
and they work straight from breezy sources,
let me know
we know - it's already backported
look at the main backports forum
your best bet is the mailing list
dch

it's part of bash
